pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mypy -- Optional Static Typing for Python=========================================Add type annotations to your Python programs, and use mypy to typecheck them. Mypy is essentially a Python linter on steroids, and itcan catch many programming errors by analyzing your program, withoutactually having to run it. Mypy has a powerful type system withfeatures such as type inference, gradual typing, generics and uniontypes.
